item.title: Textual Encounters of the Worthwhile Kind
item.description: Reading without taking notes is as good as not reading at all. .org-center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; text-align: center; } —————————————————————————————— Think of the last text you read --- a book, a chapter, an article, a blog post. What do you remember about it? What do you remember more clearly:
